# `isAuthenticatedAsync()`

Use `isAuthenticatedAsync` to wait and check if the user is authenticated or not.

```ts
const isAuthenticated  = awiat auth.isAuthenticatedAsync();

if (isAuthenticated) {
  console.log('User is authenticated');
}
```
